Module Simulator
Package kin.env.obstaclesdyn

Class Ball

java.lang.Object
kin.env.obstacles.Obstacle
kin.env.obstacles.SphericalObstacle
kin.env.obstaclesdyn.Ball
public class Ball
extends SphericalObstacle
A spherical dynamic obstacle. It can be moved by the robot, rolls through the environment and gets reflected by obstacles.
Author:
Jörg Roth (Joerg.Roth@Wireless-earth.org)

  • Field Details

    • id

      public int id
      A unique ball number, according to the occurence in the environment file, used to identify balls.

    • resistance

      public double resistance
      Degradation of velocity each update cycle of ArmBot.SIMULATION_TICK_DELTA. If, e.g. the value is 0.8, then after a cycle, the velocity get 80% smaller.

    • bounce

      public double bounce
      When colliding with an obstacle that cause 'bouncing': the degradation of bouncing velocity. If, e.g. the value is 0.8, then after colliding the velocity gets 80% smaller.

    • vx

      public double vx
      Velocity in cm each update cycle of ArmBot.SIMULATION_TICK_DELTA (x).

    • vy

      public double vy
      Velocity in each update cycle of ArmBot.SIMULATION_TICK_DELTA (y).

    • vz

      public double vz
      Velocity in each update cycle of ArmBot.SIMULATION_TICK_DELTA (z).

    • colI

      public int[] colI

    • col

      public java.awt.Color col

    • colDark

      public java.awt.Color colDark

    • colFX

      public javafx.scene.paint.Color colFX

  • Constructor Details

    • Ball

      public Ball​(int id, double cx, double cy, double cz, double rad, double resistance, double bounce, int[] color)
      Create a ball.
      Parameters:
      id - a unique ball number, according to the occurence in the environment file, used to identify balls. The id corresponds to the index in Environment.getBalls(), i.e. environment.getBalls().get(id) returns the respective ball.
      cx - center x
      cy - center y
      cz - center's height
      rad - ball's radius
      resistance - degradation of velocity per second
      bounce - degradation of bounce energy per bounce event
      color - ball color

  • Method Details

    • resetBall

      public void resetBall()
      Reset the ball's state to the original state when initializing the environment. I.e., the position is the one from the environment file and velocity is zero.

    • isDynamic

      public boolean isDynamic()
      Description copied from class: Obstacle
      Is it a dynamic obstacle, i.e. one that changes its location.
      Specified by:
      isDynamic in class Obstacle
      Returns:
      dynamic?
